name: Magic Missile
description:
Magic Missile is an improvisational game of wizards' battles for social media. Using found images from the internet, you and your opponent conjure spells at one another to decide who is the most powerful wiz of all.

Play it on Twitter. Play it on Facebook. In the near future, you'll play it in full VR, plugged directly into all the world's datastreams. It will be the only way for cybermancers to resolve their differences.

You'll get a double-sided PDF of the rules. That's all you'll need to initiate wizard battles.

Magic Missile is a Sorry Not Sorry Game.
